name: cua-mcp-server
description: Computer-Use Agent (Cua) MCP server for desktop automation and interaction
long_description: The Cua Computer-Use Agent extension provides powerful desktop automation capabilities through Claude Desktop. It can take screenshots, interact with applications, and execute complex computer tasks using AI agents. Perfect for automating repetitive desktop workflows, testing applications, and performing computer-based tasks through natural language instructions.

tools.name: screenshot_cua
tools.description: Take a screenshot of the current desktop screen and return the image

tools.name: run_cua_task
tools.description: Run a Computer-Use Agent task on the desktop and return the result with screenshot

tools.name: run_multi_cua_tasks
tools.description: Run multiple Computer-Use Agent tasks sequentially or concurrently

tools.name: get_session_stats
tools.description: Get statistics about active sessions and resource usage

tools.name: cleanup_session
tools.description: Cleanup a specific session and release its resources

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: Your API key for the AI model (Anthropic, OpenAI, etc.)

model_name.title: Model Name
model_name.description: The AI model to use for computer tasks (e.g., anthropic/claude-sonnet-4-20250514, openai/gpt-4o)

max_images.title: Maximum Images
max_images.description: Maximum number of recent images to keep in context (default: 3)
